website_summaries.verdict: A hydrating toner spray that soothes and hydrates to keep your skin looking bright and healthy.
pros: Alcohol-free hydrating toner and cleansing spray
Helps balance your pH and keeps skin looking young and healthy
Gives you a dewy look without making your skin greasy
cons: Expensive for the amount of product that you get

customer_reviews.title: Not the authentic Murad hydrating toner, doesn't have the Murad seal and bottle is a knock off compared to the real one
customer_reviews.text: Not the real Murad toner, I bought one from the murad site and that bottle had the authentic seal which Murad says it has on all their products. After trying this it has no effect on my face, now the actual murad one it feels like my face is more mouisterized and clean. My suggestion stay away and go to the actual Murad site or the list of websites Murad approves. Amazon is not an official seller for Murad.
customer_reviews.author: Rahman Khan

customer_reviews.title: Great toner for PH balancing but not as hydrating as ...
customer_reviews.text: Great toner for PH balancing but not as hydrating as one might think. Some days it stings my skin like witch hazel. I still prefer this toner over any others I have tried beside toning lotions. Great product. PH balance is everything. This is a must have for those using cleansers that aren't specifically formulated to balance PH levels in their skin. Having those in check makes for clearer more balanced skin.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Hydrated and Toned
customer_reviews.text: The Murad Hydrating Toner is the best! Whenever my face feels dry, parched, and is uneven in tone, I use the Murad Hydrating toner. You can feel it working immediately to hydrate, refresh, and cool down the skin. I use it right out of the shower and add a moisturizer after use. My face looks radiant and feels refreshed, supple and hydrated right after using the Murad Hydrating Toner.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Smells like rotting Kitchen Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I like the fragrance free resurgence cleanser (wish it had a nice scent but no scent is fine), but this toner smells awful like rotting kitchen scraps. I just couldn't stomach it. I even tried to mask the smell with a pretty smelling moisturizer (not Murad). Had to throw it out. So before you buy this I suggest only purchasing a small trial bottle.
customer_reviews.author: jce

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This smells so bad. I can handle the smell so I've only used it a few times and didn't notice any benefits when I did. Certainly not worth dealing with the horrible smell on your face. I read another review that compared the smell to stinky kitchen scraps....agree. wish I'd read it before I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great Toner, Wrong Skin Type
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving it 4 stars because I absolutely loved this stuff and how hydrating it is. It smells amazing but unfortunately I had to quit using it because it was causing me to break out with acne and I never hardly have acne. I would totally recommend it to someone who doesn't have my sensitive skin though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I saw the excellent reviews on this
customer_reviews.text: As a Murad user, I've never used, nor heard of this until I was looking on line for more Murad Resurgence products. I saw the excellent reviews on this, so I ordered it. I've been using it for a month now. I have very dry skin and this really keeps my skin moist. I cannot go without it after washing my face and my face drying out. I really love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Not as hydrating as expected
customer_reviews.text: It arrived right on time. I purchased it for the hydrating quality but I don't feel the hydration works all that well. I have dry skin. I won't be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Anytime I wash my face. I pat it dry and spray on a light coting of this hydrating toner. It feels so good. I've been using it for a month now, and my complexion is the best it's ever been. I've been using other Murad products for 2 months and they are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Blondie26

customer_reviews.title: I'm Liking This Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for quite a while. When I first received it, I used it a couple of times, then set it aside. Picked it back up here recently and started using it daily, and love it. I've been spraying a tad on my neck and letting it dry prior to any moisturizer's/creams. Seems to be keeping my neck area moisturized. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: FLANATIVGAL

customer_reviews.title: Huge price jump.
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this for $36 a bottle and saw tonight it's almost $50. Why the significant jump in 4 months time? I liked it when it was $30 a bottle. I dealt with $36 a bottle. I will find a new toner for $50/bottle.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: I like it, I think it's a great product and ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, I think it's a great product and it works well but I feel like I can find a cheaper alternative. I have sensitive/dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I only give it four stars because I have only been using it for a few days. But so far, I like the smell and it doesn't dry out my skin. I also have very sensitive skin and it hasn't caused me to break out or develop the perioral dermatitis I'm prone to
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Register

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, refreshing. I like it most if all because it contains no alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: Catalino Narvaez

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Smell
customer_reviews.text: Smelled awful. Pretty sure it had expired and gone bad.
customer_reviews.author: kathy novakovich

customer_reviews.title: I use this all the time and this one had a horrible smell.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this was an original product. I use this all the time and this one had a horrible smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dewy light hydration!
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this toner feels when sprayed and the scent is so refreshing and uplifting. I use I under and over make up to get a dewy look and supple moisturized skin.
customer_reviews.author: Terah

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting, no way is this real Murad
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting, no way is this real Murad! It smells gross! But..... went to smell it at the store And that’s just the way this product smells. It’s the grape seed that has a smell to it but the toner itself is a great toner.
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: So refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I've been using it for 2 years now and I think my skin is addicted! I spray it on my face immediately after washing and it leaves my skin feeling quenched and refreshed. Follow it with night cream or daytime moisturizer and you're good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Golla

customer_reviews.title: Be careful which seller you buy from.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this Murad Hydrating Toner for years and it is a wonderful product that keeps my skin clear and soft feeling, but I'm not sure this latest bottle, purchased from One Stop Supply, is authentic. The bottle does not have the Murad hologram on it like every single other bottle I've had, and it smells slightly different. I am probably just being paranoid, but now that I've seen all the reviews stating to look for the hologram I'm really doubting this product! Not sure I will risk using it, and I will stick with buying directly from Murad in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Chartwell

customer_reviews.title: Great for cystic acne sufferers like me. Try it!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful and authentic!! Great toner. I have the worse acne, hormonal breakouts and this toner soothes my skin and does not irritate it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizing toner
customer_reviews.text: Best moisturizing toner! I also use it after my make up is on and throughout the day for xtra moister and a dewy look.
customer_reviews.author: sandra hansen

customer_reviews.title: Best toner ever!
customer_reviews.text: I always feel like I'm splurging on this toner but the truth is, when I run out and use a cheaper brand, I feel as if there is a residue on my skin. Murad makes the best toner!
customer_reviews.author: A. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: This works! I have menopausal acne prone skin that ...
customer_reviews.text: This works! I have menopausal acne prone skin that doesn't exfoliate well. I use this toner in the a.m. and p.m. to help exfoliate my skin. It does not dry my face out at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love all Resurgence products. I spray this right after I was my face. Love the smell and feel after.
customer_reviews.author: lala

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Has a very light "peach" smell to me which is no too overbearing. Light weight with no stickiness.
customer_reviews.author: Jules Davis

customer_reviews.title: It has a lovely scent and is the best toner I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I use this twice a day. It has a lovely scent and is the best toner I've ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Diederich

customer_reviews.title: Murad Hydrating Toner, Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is about the best toner, cleanser I have ever used and I've used quite a few. I would recommend it highly to anyone who uses this type product
customer_reviews.author: Ethelann

customer_reviews.title: Great Toner
customer_reviews.text: The toner hydrates my face with no sticky residue. Great product! I would recommend this product to everyone looking for a good toner.
customer_reviews.author: nylass

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail Toner!
customer_reviews.text: Holy grail toner! I’ve gone through at least 5 or 6 bottles of this stuff. Balances my skin out after washing and before my skincare routine like no other!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: i went somewhere to get a facial, and when i laid down so the lady could examine my face, she was amazed at how hydrated my skin was. it works!
customer_reviews.author: Fam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I needed a non-drying toner and this product is perfect. It is truly refreshing!It doesn't dry my skin and gives it a dewy smoothness.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernGirlNJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this line of products and I love that its cheaper than Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: Erin King

customer_reviews.title: Ladies 50 & Over Try It!
customer_reviews.text: As a 50+ woman, once I start using Murad again, my skin looks better within a week. I get out of the shower and while my face is still damp, I spray some on and make sure I follow-up with the Murad Resurgence Youthful Skin Renewal Kit each night.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa R. Cochrane

customer_reviews.title: Just started using. I'll need to get back to ...
customer_reviews.text: Just started using. I'll need to get back to you later!

customer_reviews.title: A Major Part of my Daily Regimen
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years, but honestly can't say if it's really doing anything, or if it's just a part of my daily routine now. It has a great smell, and my face does feel ... fresher I guess ... after using it, but I still have to follow it up with a moisturizer afterwards because my skin is very dry in the winter time. It's made for dry skin, but maybe mine is just dryer than the types they are considering in the packaging. But at the end of the day something keeps me coming back to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Living in Glitter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this toner - so refreshing, I find myself using it several times during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Bonny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always love this product. It's very good to my skin.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this product my girl who does my facials recommended it. works great

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years and am very happy with this product

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works well, feels very hydrating on my skin. will purchase again. Good value for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Keeps my skin soft and adds needed moisture to my dry skin.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic toner. I does what it is supposed to ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic toner. I does what it is supposed to do and it is a decent price for the quality.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love how this makes my skin feel
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love how this makes my skin feel. I had patches of flakey skin during a certain time of the month and as soon as I would use this, it would heal it.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca hicks

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. It has a nice fragrance and leaves my skin feeling nourished. I use this in conjunction with the cream cleanser and the night cream. My skin feels hydrated and looks fairly radiant, but then again I also use vitamin E oil on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: This was recommend for my dry skin when i had a facial. I have been using it for a year now and my skin is not as dry, especially during the winter. It goes in before your moisturizer.

customer_reviews.title: Authentic product!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product, it's authentic, and will be ordering it again!!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing skincare product line
customer_reviews.text: I have had acne practically all of my teen/early adulthood and this is the only product that has done wonders. I feel like every penny was well spent on not only reducing my acne and blemishes, but it has seriously made my skin look wonderful. I would highly recommend anyone to try this at least once, because it was definitely and still is worth my while.
customer_reviews.author: KitsuneUzu

customer_reviews.title: Item as described. Smelled a bit different than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Smelled a bit different than the real one for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: caren funk

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizes well and calms irritation. Its very refreshing and has a nice scent. The bottle also lasts for awhile so that's a bonus.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Keep the skin hydrated all day when day or night cream is applied over it.

customer_reviews.title: very good product; I'm 54 sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: very good product;I'm 54 sensitive skin. not oily absorbs very well.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great price, prompt shipping. It's a great product. Very refreshing. Love the scent. I use it daily. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J. Occhino

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love to use toner but hate to use cotton balls to put it on - this spray-on is the best! Smells great, feels fresh & clean, leaves skin soft. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BeNice

customer_reviews.title: Item came to my house fast
customer_reviews.text: The product was shipped really fast. I really love Murad's toner. I feel refreshed throughout the day. You can use this toner anytime of the day.
customer_reviews.author: westvegas83

customer_reviews.title: I have never used toner before but the girl that ...
customer_reviews.text: I have never used toner before but the girl that does my facials said it puts the ph of the skin back to normal after cleansing. Unless I were to put a ph strip to my skin, who knows! But I will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anne

customer_reviews.title: Murad
customer_reviews.text: Murad is one of the best products for my skin texture. I absolutely love this line of beauty products. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Omar

customer_reviews.title: A Great Toner
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying the toning results of the product. It gives the skin a a rather soft glowing affect. One of the best toners I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Mason

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: This is light. I can see where people would like it, but I don't, and I can't understand why exactly.
customer_reviews.author: A. Almeida

customer_reviews.title: An Okay Investment, Murad Hydrating Toner
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to try this toner since the reviews here on amazon was very positive. However, I do not know if it is all that AMAZING as most people state. (*Side note* Everyone has different skin types, etc. so the results will vary) Personally, I don't like the fragrance--I prefer none to clean smell--this toner smells like a light flower body spray.. I also didn't read carefully and found out that this toner is for people who have dry skin..I, on the other hand, have oily skin...If anyone could recommend me any products that controls facial oil that would be great! Until then, I will be using this product and will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: katjoy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product, ALOT cheaper from getting it at Ulta. I would highly recommended this product before applying murad SPF 30 moisturizer and make up!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: very good hydrating toner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in the winter, it really helped keep my skin smooth. I will definitely buy another one in future.
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: Funny sugar smell
customer_reviews.text: Smells funny and must have some sugar substance because tiny ants gathered around my bureau where I would mist it on my face. Other than those two drawbacks, the toner works ok
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My wife really liked it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my wife. She tried other products before Murad. She is now happy with it.it worth money we gave.
customer_reviews.author: adem öztürk

customer_reviews.title: Not Murad.
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real product. It does not smell the same at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bama

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice way to remove any feel omelet sly clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Do not think this is the authentic MURAD product. ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not think this is the authentic MURAD product. I have purchased MURAD from my day spa several times and have not had any problems/reactions to the product. This product does not have the same scent and it burns and irritates my face within minutes after I apply it.
customer_reviews.author: LexisKarma

customer_reviews.title: Great skin hydration provided by this toner!
customer_reviews.text: This toner makes my face feel hydrated and clean. I have dry skin, so I normally always have to put lotion on after I wash my face or it feels dry and crackly. This is the first toner I've found that I can spray on my face and actually have it feel hydrated. I use it after showers instead of lotion a few times a a week in order to give my pores a chance to air out. I have been using this for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: S. Perez-Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Murad Resurgence Hydrating Facial Toner
customer_reviews.text: This product was discontinued unfortunately. I really like the Resurgence 3 step system for problem skin. I've used it for many years and haven't found a substitute that works as well or is as easy and this was. When you see it online purchase it because you won't find it around much longer.
customer_reviews.author: lbartist

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I did not know I even needed a hydrating toner as badly as I did! I bought this one b/c I love Murad and I did want to try a toner again. I LOVE this product! While it smells fresh but a little on the grandma'ish side.... my face has never felt better waking up! I must have been so dry. And I love easy!! Just a couple of quick sprays... and done! Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany C

customer_reviews.title: Extra moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go a day without this toner. Enhances my moisturizer and is a nice cool refreshing experience
customer_reviews.author: Ellen C.

customer_reviews.title: My skin still has acne breakouts (at age 63) however I am so pleased with Murad facial products for acne-proned skin
customer_reviews.text: After I wash my face with Renewing Cleansing Creme Resurgence, this product finishes up cleaning the pours as seen on my cotton pad(s). My skin still has acne breakouts (at age 63) however I am so pleased with Murad facial products for acne-proned skin.
customer_reviews.author: Payne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used Murad for over 8 years and LOVE the product. Great results for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nedcoop

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Not drying to the skin at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Fits in my purse, I can spray when I need some moisture on my skin. Great price. Much cheaper through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: D R W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Addictive. Makes my face smell fruity fresh! Skin loves this toner, moist, not oily and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey W

customer_reviews.title: Murad Hydrating toner
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for about one year now. I love it! My skin no longer gets those break outs. I use it every morning and again in the evening. It leaves my skin clean without dry spots. I also use a moisturizer on winter days but I don't need it in summer months. Anyone looking for a refreshing clean feeling product. Try this!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: I love this toner
customer_reviews.text: I love this toner! Have no idea if it does anything wonderful for my skin other than it feels very refreshing, and that seems to be enough for me. I was out of it for a couple of weeks and really missed it.
customer_reviews.author: MardiK

customer_reviews.title: ... this product for some time and this toner is fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this product for some time and this toner is fantastic.

customer_reviews.title: Best product around for smooth skin.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product while at a spa a year ago and this price is inexpensive. The product moisturizes the skin after cleansing. I get lots of compliments on my smooth skin.
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaP

customer_reviews.title: Too much fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine as a toner but had too much fragrance for me.
customer_reviews.author: LagunaLady

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great product. Tones skin well. Using it with a cleanser, getting great results. Massage chain charged me 2xprice, so I returned and ordered this. Using daily for 2 months and not even half used.
customer_reviews.author: Happy as a clam

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I like this toner a lot because it's slightly moisturizing, which I need after cleansing my face. Sometimes I can go without a moisturizer after using this (only in warm weather, in the winter it's too dry). Great product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hamrah

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I love the way it makes my skin feel. Very refreshing! Does not break me out and I have oily acneic skin. I also use it to set my make up. I personally like the smell but some people don't.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: If you have red skin, this does help. Makes me feel great to use same products my esthetician uses. Will buy from again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great way to wake up and go to sleep... nice pleasant smell and absorbs quickly

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It has made a difference in the moisture of my 'mature' skin. I recommend it. Age 60.

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this feel when you spray it on. It is light and airy

customer_reviews.title: Great toner for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time and love it -- really cleans my skin without drying, and leaves a nice subtle scent.

customer_reviews.text: Best Toner for dry skin I have ever tried. The price is great too. This spray lasts a long time. Cannot go without my Murad toner!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: have been using it for 6 months and do not plan to try any other toner

customer_reviews.title: drying toner!
customer_reviews.text: I have dry sensitive skin. Although I've had great results with other Murad products, this one dries out my skin, instead of hydrating.

customer_reviews.title: ... use this all the time and have been very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time and have been very happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: Clean and refreshing - but can leave a 'sticky' residue
customer_reviews.text: I like this product - it's more moisturizing than other toners. The directions state you can spritz it directly on your face and let it air dry or you can gently wipe it off. I notice that when I spritz it on and let it air dry, it can leave kind of a sticky feel to my skin after it's dried. Otherwise, I like it.

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: completely hydrates and improves skin in appearance and softness. I use it morning and night after I cleanse, and I Love it!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good stuff and the "system" really works. recommended by my aesthetician.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Mudrad Hydrating work great as a toner for my face love it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and truly hydrates while giving you that polished feel after a good face-wash. Really tightens pores.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have used for 15 years and still can feel results

product_meta.title: Murad Resurgence Hydrating Facial Toner - Step 1 Cleanse/Tone (6.0 fl oz), Alcohol-Free Toner that Replenishes and Refreshes Skin with Peach and Cucumber Extracts to Soothe and Minimize Irritation
product_meta.description:
"It's not skincare, 

It's Murad. 

Murad is founded on the simple truth that living younger is a choice you can make every day. We believe that youth is a reflection of how you feel, how you look and how you live, because every aspect of your life is as interconnected as every cell in your body. That’s why everything we do at Murad is designed to help you activate youth through hydration at the cellular level. 

Murad—a connected life is a beautiful life. 


Murad Hydrating Toner - 6.0 oz. - Murad Resurgence - Alcohol-free toner replenishes lost moisture to refresh skin and prepare it for treatment. Provides a lightweight mist that rehydrates while restoring skin's natural pH balance and neutralizes surface impurities. This hydrating toner balances, hydrates and neutralizes surface impurities. Lecithin helps lock in moisture and restores suppleness. A perfect way to prepare skin for treatment. 

How to use: AM and PM. Apply evenly over clean face, neck and chest. Follow with a Murad Step 2 treatment. "
